faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to the most important questions about digital property presentation
faq.q1: Can I display a digital listing on a regular TV?
faq.a1: Yes. The requirement is an internet connection and an integrated web browser. Most current Smart TVs meet these requirements. Alternatively, an external media player like a Chromecast or Fire TV Stick can be used.
faq.q2: What's the difference between a regular TV and a signage display?
faq.a2: A regular TV is designed for private use and is good for getting started. A professional signage display is designed for continuous 24/7 operation, offers higher brightness, longer lifespan, and is specifically intended for storefronts or commercial environments.
faq.q3: Does the display also work in portrait format?
faq.a3: Yes. Our solution supports both portrait and landscape format. The orientation can be individually set for each display and adjusted at any time.
faq.q4: How does the QR code per property work?
faq.a4: When creating a property, you can optionally add a link, for example to the property page on your own website. A QR code is automatically generated from this on the digital listing. Interested parties scan the code and go directly to the specified destination.
faq.q5: How quickly are changes visible on the display?
faq.a5: Changes are visible immediately after saving in the cloud portal. The displays automatically update the content, so the current status is always shown.
faq.q6: How is the display selection and setup done?
faq.a6: You can procure and set up the display yourself. Alternatively, we offer a full service – from selecting and procuring the right display to setup and optional on-site installation. Feel free to contact us, we'll find a suitable solution for your needs.
